Analysis<T> The analysis component processes data and populates a track with Features. AudioUtil Beat A Beat represents the rhythm of the song. BeatTrack A Track that contains Beat Features. BeatTracker The BeatTracker estimates at which points beats occur in the song. The beat represents the rhythm of the song. Bindings<T> Utility class for creating matching generic types. Chroma Chroma features are closely related to pitch and represent the most prominent notes in the song. ChromaCreator ChromaDrawer Chromagram The Chromagram detects the most prominent notes at different times in the song. ChromaGUI ChromaTrack A Track that contains Chroma features ClipBoard DebugDrawer The DebugDrawer is a component that draws basic information for a RhythmPlayer. EditorAnalyzer EditorState Feature Feature is the base type that holds information in a Track. OnsetCreator OnsetDetector The OnsetDetector estimates times at which onsets occur in a song. An onset is the start of a note in a song. OnsetDrawer OnsetGUI OnsetTrack A Track that contains Onset Features. RhythmAnalyzer The RhythmAnalyzer is the main component that analyzes a song. The RhythmAnalyzer component uses Analysis components to populate a RhythmData object with Tracks. RhythmData RhythmData stores information about the song in the form of Tracks. RhythmDataEditor RhythmEventProvider A RhythmEventProvider provides events for Tracks in a RhythmData object. RhythmPlayer The RhythmPlayer syncs RhythmData with an AudioSource. It provides more accurate time information than an AudioSource. RhythmTarget A RhythmTarget can be targeted by a RhythmPlayer. RhythmToolWindow Segmenter The Segmenter find sections of the song at which large changes in average volume occur. These changes often indicate different segments of a song. Styles TimeRuler Track A Track is a collection of Features that are ordered in time. Track<T> A Track is a collection of Features that are ordered in time. TrackDrawer The TrackDrawer draws basic information for a specific Track. TrackDrawer<T> The TrackDrawer draws basic information for a specific Track.
